persona.name: Alexis Dubief
persona.personality: Empathetic and thoughtful, deeply aware of the complexities faced by parents, while also advocating for evidence-based solutions.
persona.notes: Runs a Facebook group called 'Precious Little Sleep' and emphasizes the need for more research into infant sleep safety.
persona.communication_style: Engaging and clear, mixes factual information with personal insights to connect with parents.
